title: 1000 Wins
body: Rito members as always you do the 1k wins with a player, currently i am sitting at 998 and am looking forward to doing my 1000th win.

replies.body: Add me Jason. (I'm ingame now but I can play one a bit later)
Hey MasterMirkinen, may I do my 1000th win
Good luck mate. Hope you have a fun game.

Well think of it this way if everyone is trolling there will be 8 less trolls out there. (for a while.)
because of course the riot member won't troll and ofc this Summoner won't troll with a riot member
I forgot all about it i'm way past 1000 now :(

Huh I didn't think they still did this :D Really cool to see.


......Only 710 some wins to go for me though XD
